name: blinkguard
description: Open-source safety layer for Solana Blinks - pre-validates transactions before wallet interaction

scripts.build: npm run build:extension && npm run build:api
scripts.build:extension: npm run build:shared && tsc -p extension/tsconfig.json && node extension/build.js
scripts.build:shared: tsc shared/*.ts --outDir extension/dist/shared --module ES2022 --target ES2022 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
scripts.build:shared:api: tsc shared/*.ts --outDir api/dist/shared --module ES2022 --target ES2022 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck

author: BlinkGuard Team
